title: Sunday's dog
abstract: Winner - Primary Animation. A tale of friendship between Sunday and a stray dog.
description: When Sunday went to live with her grandmother she didn't have any friends to play with. One day a stray dog walked down the lane behind her house. It was missing a tail and an ear. Nobody wanted it. Sunday made friends with the dog but it was taken away to the pound. Weeks passed. Dogs were adopted and other dogs were led away to a big blue door. Finally, Sunday found the dog at the pound and adopted him. When they got home, Sunday made him a special hat with two ears and a tail for him to wag. Creators: Pepper Horman,  Maddie Jamieson Goddard, Fionnuala Keith,    Jennifer Petroploulos, Lucy Hanna, Declan Warren, Piper McLeod, Amy Phillips, Elan Cotter, Georgia Dickie, Isabella Godfrey, Lucinda McSherry, Millie Barnes, Nick Warren, Ella O'Donoghue, Isobel Hyett, Michael Guzzardi, Lucy Phillips, Clare Olding and Jagger Skilbeck.  Under the category 'Primary Animation', Years 5 and 6, Yarraville West Primary School, Victoria, were the Screen It 2012 winners.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002642; 'Screen It' 2012 [winning entries]; Active; 2012
